0,0-a.text: Oh man, my first time going to Tokyo...Hope I dont get lost!

0,6-d.text: The Japanese Self Defense Force Base...Wonder if I'll ever visit some day...'

0,7-a.text: Oh I think the camps sign is over to the right, maybe I'll check it out...'

0,18-a.text: 7/11 is up ahead, I've heard its really good here!'

0,21-c.text: Mt Fuji looks crazy from here!

0,22-d.text: I better get a snack real quick...

bus_stop.text: Oh shit! The bus is here already!

get_on_bus.text: Glad I made it, that was a close one.

0,23-a.text: This must be the station, maybe I'll look around before I leave...'

-2,23-b.text: I could go for some ramen...I've heard this shop is really good!'

vending.text: What the hell...How does this even work...Ill just pick a random one...

gotemba_statoin.text: I better get my bus ticket.

0,24-b.text: Wow, so this is Tokyo?! It's so busy!'

0,24-c.text: I gotta hail a taxi to get to my AirBnB!

tokyo.text: Thank you for playing! This walk through was based on my real life experience of going to Tokyo for the first time! - Jamison
